show_name: Suteki desu wa, Sakura-chan! Tomoyo no Cardcaptor Sakura Katsuyaku Video Nikki! (OAV)
other_title: You're Great, Sakura-chan! Tomoyo's Cardcaptor Sakura Action Video Diary!
すてきですわ、さくらちゃん！ 知世のカードキャプターさくら活躍ビデオ日記！ (Japanese)
plot: A video about how Sakura, Tomoyo, and Kero made the first openingThe second video is where Kero gets framed for eating the cupcakes that Sakura bakes and in the third video, Yamazaki talks about a blue mailbox. In this video, the girls realise that his eyes were open when he said that and come to believe that Yamazaki is telling the truth whenever that happens.
